file_insights.primary_purpose: Google Calendar API integration with OAuth and event analysis

patterns_discovered: Modular service design with multiple helper classes
gotchas_discovered: Depends on environment variables for configuration
Complex token refresh and management logic
Multiple potential failure points in OAuth flow
Needs careful handling of expired/invalid tokens

key_achievements: Created robust OAuth flow with token management
potential_risks: High complexity may lead to maintenance challenges
Potential security risks with token management

recommendations: Add more comprehensive unit tests for OAuth and event fetching
Add more detailed documentation for configuration requirements
Create a more generic interface for different calendar providers
Implement circuit breaker pattern for API calls
